unnormalised: ## Ditch the Cassettes, Embrace the Stream: Your Guide to Music Streaming
normalised: ## Ditch the Cassettes, Embrace the Stream: Your Guide to Music Streaming

unnormalised: Hey everyone! Remember those days of carefully winding cassettes with a pencil after they’d tangled in your Walkman? Or meticulously organizing your CDs, hoping they wouldn’t get scratched? Thankfully, those days are largely behind us thanks to the magic of music streaming!
normalised: Hey everyone! Remember those days of carefully winding cassettes with a pencil after they’d tangled in your Walkman? Or meticulously organizing your compact discs, hoping they wouldn’t get scratched? Thankfully, those days are largely behind us thanks to the magic of music streaming!

unnormalised: It's hard to imagine life before instant access to practically every song ever recorded, right? We've come a long way since Radio Ceylon played our favourite Bollywood hits. Now, we have a plethora of options at our fingertips – Spotify, Apple Music, Gaana, JioSaavn – all vying for our listening ears.
normalised: It's hard to imagine life before instant access to practically every song ever recorded, right? We've come a long way since Radio Ceylon played our favourite Bollywood hits. Now, we have a plethora of options at our fingertips – Spotify, Apple Music, Gaana, JioSaavn – all vying for our listening ears.

unnormalised: But with so many choices, which one’s right for you? It really depends on your preferences. Some platforms offer superior audio quality (like lossless audio), while others boast better curated playlists. Some are stronger on Bollywood soundtracks – think the latest chart-toppers from Dharma Productions – while others excel in international genres.
normalised: But with so many choices, which one’s right for you? It really depends on your preferences. Some platforms offer superior audio quality (like lossless audio), while others boast better curated playlists. Some are stronger on Bollywood soundtracks – think the latest chart-toppers from Dharma Productions – while others excel in international genres.

unnormalised: The beauty of streaming is the sheer convenience. Creating playlists for every mood is a breeze. Need some motivational tunes for your morning jog around Marine Drive? Done. Want some chill vibes for studying late into the night at IIT Bombay? Sorted. And the discoverability is incredible. I've found countless new artists I'd never have encountered otherwise.
normalised: The beauty of streaming is the sheer convenience. Creating playlists for every mood is a breeze. Need some motivational tunes for your morning jog around Marine Drive? Done. Want some chill vibes for studying late into the night at I I T Bombay? Sorted. And the discoverability is incredible. I've found countless new artists I'd never have encountered otherwise.

unnormalised: Of course, there’s the cost factor. Most services offer a free tier with ads, but a premium subscription gets you ad-free listening, offline downloads (essential for those dodgy mobile network spots!), and often, better audio quality. Plans typically start around Rs. 99 a month in India, but family plans offer even better value.
normalised: Of course, there’s the cost factor. Most services offer a free tier with ads, but a premium subscription gets you ad-free listening, offline downloads (essential for those dodgy mobile network spots!), and often, better audio quality. Plans typically start around rupees ninety nine a month in India, but family plans offer even better value.

unnormalised: Don’t forget about data consumption. Streaming can eat up a lot of data, especially if you’re on a cellular connection. Downloading your favorite playlists beforehand is a smart move, particularly if you're traveling or know you'll be in an area with weak signal. Imagine being stuck in traffic on the NH44 with no tunes! Disaster!
normalised: Don’t forget about data consumption. Streaming can eat up a lot of data, especially if you’re on a cellular connection. Downloading your favorite playlists beforehand is a smart move, particularly if you're traveling or know you'll be in an area with weak signal. Imagine being stuck in traffic on the N H fourty four with no tunes! Disaster!

unnormalised: So, ditch the dusty cassettes and embrace the streaming revolution. There's a whole world of music waiting to be discovered. Happy listening!
normalised: So, ditch the dusty cassettes and embrace the streaming revolution. There's a whole world of music waiting to be discovered. Happy listening!
